Package DBAccess

Class DBAppointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • DBAccess.DBAppointments
  • public class DBAppointments
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that handles all the requests for communication with the database for the Appointments.

      DBAppointments()

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void addNewAppointment​(Appointments newAppointment)
      Gets Appointment object passed from other controllers and saves it to the database.
      static void deleteSelectedAppointment​(int appointmentToDeleteId)
      Deletes appointment fom the database based on the passed appointment Id.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
      Method to get all appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsByTypeAndMonth()
      Method returns month and type occurrences from appointments using group by sql syntax.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentScheduleForContact​(int passedContactId)
      Method returns ObservableList of appointments of contacts for the schedule report.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsForCustomers​(java.time.LocalDateTime passedStartDT, java.time.LocalDateTime passedEndDT, int passedCustomerId)
      This method has input parameters that gets start and end appointment times.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsForLoggedInUser​(int passedUserId)
      Method returns ObservableList of appointments for the logged in user whose appointments are within next 15 minutes of logging in.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCurrentMonthAppointments()
      Method to get current Month's appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCurrentWeekAppointments()
      Method to get current Week's appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList.
      static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getOverlappingAppointmentsForCustomersMinusSelectedAppointment​(java.time.LocalDateTime passedStartDT, java.time.LocalDateTime passedEndDT, int passedCustomerId, int passedAppointmentId)
      This method has input parameters that gets start and end appointment times.
      static void updateSelectedAppointment​(Appointments passedAppointment)
      Gets Appointment object passed from other controllers and updates it on the database based on the passed object's Id.

    • Method Detail

      • getAllAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
        Method to get all appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList.

      • getCurrentMonthAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCurrentMonthAppointments()
        Method to get current Month's appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList. Utilizes TemporalAdjusters to get the first day and last day of the month for the current ZoneDateTime.

      • getCurrentWeekAppointments

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getCurrentWeekAppointments()
        Method to get current Week's appointments from the database and return result in an ObservableList. Utilizes TemporalAdjusters to get the first day and last day of the week for the current ZoneDateTime.

      • addNewAppointment

        public static void addNewAppointment​(Appointments newAppointment)
        Gets Appointment object passed from other controllers and saves it to the database.

      • updateSelectedAppointment

        public static void updateSelectedAppointment​(Appointments passedAppointment)
        Gets Appointment object passed from other controllers and updates it on the database based on the passed object's Id.

      • deleteSelectedAppointment

        public static void deleteSelectedAppointment​(int appointmentToDeleteId)
        Deletes appointment fom the database based on the passed appointment Id.

      • getAppointmentsByTypeAndMonth

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsByTypeAndMonth()
        Method returns month and type occurrences from appointments using group by sql syntax.

      • getAppointmentScheduleForContact

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentScheduleForContact​(int passedContactId)
        Method returns ObservableList of appointments of contacts for the schedule report.

      • getAppointmentsForLoggedInUser

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsForLoggedInUser​(int passedUserId)
        Method returns ObservableList of appointments for the logged in user whose appointments are within next 15 minutes of logging in.

      • getAppointmentsForCustomers

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAppointmentsForCustomers​(java.time.LocalDateTime passedStartDT,
                                                                                          java.time.LocalDateTime passedEndDT,
                                                                                          int passedCustomerId)
        This method has input parameters that gets start and end appointment times. If, in the database, there are any appointments(Start and End) that fall between the new appointment attempting to be created, return an observable list of those overlapping appointments. (Then notify/display to the user saying customer already has appointments at this time).

      • getOverlappingAppointmentsForCustomersMinusSelectedAppointment

        public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getOverlappingAppointmentsForCustomersMinusSelectedAppointment​(java.time.LocalDateTime passedStartDT,
                                                                                                                             java.time.LocalDateTime passedEndDT,
                                                                                                                             int passedCustomerId,
                                                                                                                             int passedAppointmentId)
        This method has input parameters that gets start and end appointment times. If, in the database, there are any appointments(Start and End) that fall between the new appointment attempting to be created, return an observable list of those overlapping appointments. (Then notify/display to the user saying customer already has appointments at this time).
